description: Standard table definitions for dex protocols.

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of LP pools in this protocol (one entry per token in a pool).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

creation_block_number.description: The block this pool was created in.

creation_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block that this pool was created in.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool.

lp_token_address.description: The token address of the LP token for this pool.

lp_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the LP token.

token_address.description: The token address of the pool token at token_index.

token_symbol.description: The symbol of the pool token.

token_decimals.description: The decimals of the pool token.

token_index.description: The index in the pool smart contract that this token appears at, default 0 (ie, one entry per token in a pool).

fee_rate.description: (Optional, if dynamic fee) The fee rate of the pool, as a percentage (ie, 2.3% as 0.023).

dex_type.description: The type of the DEX (ie, CPMM, CLMM, Orderbook).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

user_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_index.description: The token index based on the smart contract.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token provided as liquidity.

token_amount.description: The amount of the liquidity position in the pool, decimal normalized.

token_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of the token in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool.

token_index.description: The token index in the smart contract.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in the pool.

token_amount.description: The amount of the token in this pool at the snapshot.

token_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of the token in USD.

volume_amount.description: The volume of the token transacted in this pool during the given snapshot, decimal normalized.

volume_usd.description: (Optional) The volume transacted in the given snapshot, in USD.

fee_rate.description: The fee rate of the pool, as a percentage (ie, 2.3% as 0.023).

total_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The total amount of revenue and fees paid in this pool in the given snapshot, in USD.

user_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of total fees accrued to liquidity providers of the protocol, in USD.

protocol_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of total fees accrued to the protocol, in USD.

tables.label: Trades (All DEX Types)
tables.description: All trades across different types of DEXs.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

user_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

taker_address.description: The taker, the address that receives the output of the swap (ie, could be the same as user_address unless a proxy contract/router is used).

pair_name.description: The name of the token pair.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool being traded in.

input_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the input token.

input_token_address.description: The contract address of the input token.

input_token_amount.description: The amount of the input token, decimal normalized.

output_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the output token.

output_token_address.description: The contract address of the output token.

output_token_amount.description: The amount of the output token, decimal normalized.

swap_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of the swap in USD.

fees_usd.description: (Optional) The fees paid by the user.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the record.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

market_depth_score.description: (Ask for supporting documents and formula). The percentage price range market depth derived from a 30-day realized volatility.

total_value_locked_score.description: A score calculated based on TVL. Please see the methodology [here](./METHODOLOGY.md).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the mint.

transaction_from_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The from address of the event (ie, the from field in a transfer).

to_address.description: The to address of the event (ie, the to field in a transfer).

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

mint_amount.description: The amount of LP token minted by the trader, decimal normalized.

mint_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of the mint in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

transaction_from_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The from address of the event (ie, the from field in a transfer).

to_address.description: The to address of the event (ie, the to field in a transfer).

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

burn_amount.description: The amount of LP tokens burned, decimal normalized.

burn_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of the burn in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

transaction_from_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The address that sends the LP token.

to_address.description: The address that receives the LP token.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

pool_token_balance.description: The balance of the pool token, decimal normalized.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

transaction_from_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The from address of the event (ie, the from field in a transfer).

to_address.description: The to address of the event (ie, the to field in a transfer).

event_type.description: The action type of the event.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

transaction_from_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The from address of the event (ie, the from field in a transfer).

to_address.description: The to address of the event (ie, the to field in a transfer).

event_type.description: The action type of the event.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.
